text:
In consultation with public health professionals, we've updated @PAHealthDept reopening metrics to better capture growth, decline, & stability of #COVID19 cases.

Here's a mock example of how we'll determine target goals for reopening have been met.

More: https://t.co/jP3lAw4zkL https://t.co/K5gWUuwOhN
